comp5134.pos.system

Class SystemSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp5134.pos.system.SystemSetting

  • public abstract class SystemSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class is used to define the necessary information of this POS. Including the system properties for UI, product item selection count and merchant details.
    Author:
    Raymond Kwan
